name: hecvat-assess
description: Evaluate code repositories against the EDUCAUSE HECVAT v4.1.4 (Higher Education Community Vendor Assessment Toolkit). Scans source code, config files, CI/CD pipelines, IaC, dependencies, and documentation to auto-assess ~48% of HECVAT questions, generates compliance reports as filled xlsx files, and produces patch files for remediable gaps.
